meaningMnemonic: The <radical>Yoga</radical> <radical>King</radical> presides over all <kanji>courts</kanji>: law, imperial, and so forth. In this case, you've met him in the court of law, where he is judge, jury, and executioner.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>court</kanji> of the Yoga King is against you. You have to turn this around, so you start pushing <reading>ta</reading>ter (てい) tots into his tater-tot-hole shaped mouth.
